introduction: With a range of built-in and extensible Modes, NeonTractor lets you plan, architect, code, debug and boost your productivity like never before.
notice: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.

roo.description: The best free models to get started

chooseProvider: To do its magic, NeonTractor needs an API key.
startRouter: We recommend using an LLM Router:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:

telemetry.helpImproveMessage: NeonTractor collects error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. This telemetry does not collect code, prompts or personal information. You can turn this off in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>.
